# Marina Muchakova — Personal Website

> Tax consultant, legal specialist, and educator based in Bulgaria.

## About

Marina Muchakova (Марина Мучакова) is a tax consultant with a law degree and over 15 years of experience in Bulgarian and EU tax law. She specialises in:

- Crypto taxation and blockchain-related financial compliance
- Investment income taxation (bonds, equities, government securities)
- Double Taxation Avoidance Treaties (application and planning)
- Business structuring and profit optimisation
- MiCA (Markets in Crypto-Assets Regulation) prudential assessments and stress testing

She works across three main projects:
- **Vesta Consult** — accounting firm and consultancy (https://vesta-bg.eu)
- **The Crypto Academy** — educational platform for crypto and blockchain (https://thecrypto.academy)
- **NABI** — National Association for Blockchain and Innovation (non-profit)

## Website

- Homepage: https://muchakova.com/
- Blog: https://muchakova.com/blog.html
- Language: Bulgarian (primary) + English (toggle available on every page)

## Blog Articles

### ДЦК и как не се облагат с данъци / Government Bonds and How They Are NOT Taxed
- URL: https://muchakova.com/blog/dck-obligacii-danaci.html
- Date: 2026-02-14
- Topics: Government securities (ДЦК), bond taxation in Bulgaria, coupons, discounts, capital gains, ZDDFL (Bulgarian Personal Income Tax Act), regulated markets, ESMA, MiFID 2, Bulgarian Stock Exchange
- Languages: BG + EN

### Размерът има значение! / Size Matters!
- URL: https://muchakova.com/blog/razmer-ima-znachenie.html
- Date: 2026-02-28
- Topics: Starting capital, business stress testing, MiCA licensing, FSC (КФН), prudential requirements, business model resilience, break-even, risk buffers
- Languages: BG + EN
